evidence.claim: Aspire In Home Care provides services compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring the protection of patient information.
Aspire utilizes electronic health record systems that support interoperability standards such as FHIR and HL7 to facilitate data exchange.
The company integrates with various healthcare partners through secure connections that adhere to industry standards.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction use cases or API automation focused on healthcare data exchange.
